title: Define function in x64dbg
content:
I am reversing a fairly complex app. In x64dbg (with xAnalyzer), is it possible to have custom function definitions?

A simple example would be to have a definition for WinMain(hInstance, hPrevInstance, lpCmdLine, nCmdShow), that would show similar to this:

I tried adding API definitions to apis_def in xAnalyzer but it did not work out.

comments.text: You should be able to do it. xAnalyzer api's functions definition files are 100% customizables. Can you give more details about your issue? what files have you been editing and so on? Creator of xAnalyzer over here
